name: Horror Game (kasp443k)
description:
Welcome to Horror Game, a truly terrifying experience in the classical PSX style. I hope you enjoy this short game.

This project was made for a School Game Jam, and as such will not be very polished. I hope that will not stop you from downloading it.

Basic controls:

WASD to move.

Left click to inspect objects,

Tab to stop inspecting.

E to pick up objects.

F to talk to NPCs.

There are a bunch of free assets used in the game. I couldn't remember everyone but if your name is not on the list please contact me and I will add you. Credits to:

Classic64 Asset Library

Version 0.2

By Craig Snedeker
